Scenarios.prompt_text: Your friends invite to a party the night before a coding challenge

choices.choice_text: I stay home and study. There will always be more parties
Darn it, I'm going. I'll just shoot for the retake

Scenarios.prompt_text: Group Study Session or Movie Night?

choices.choice_text: I join the study session. Academic success is a team effort.
I skip the study session and opt for a movie night with friends.
I stay up with the team to ensure the project is top-notch.
I prioritize my sleep. I'll contribute as much as I can and trust my team to handle the rest.
I prioritize family and attend the gathering. Projects can wait.
I explain my commitments and opt for a shorter visit to balance family and personal responsibilities.
I go to the concert. A good time and music can be inspiring for the presentation.
I decline and focus on preparing for the presentation. The concert can wait for another time.
I seize the chance to make a difference and join the volunteer event.
I decline this time, prioritizing my ongoing commitments. I'll look for future opportunities.
